comments: The sequence 1,0,3,0,37,... has e.g.f. cosh(x)/(1-x^2) with a(n)=sum{k=0..n, C(n,k)k!(1+(-1)^k)(1+(-1)^(n-k))/4}. - _Paul Barry_, May 01 2005
references: A. Petojevic, On Kurepa's Hypothesis for the Left Factorial, FILOMAT (Nis), 12:1 (1998), p. 29-37.
links: Romeo Mestrovic, Variations of Kurepa's left factorial hypothesis, arXiv preprint arXiv:1312.7037, 2013
maple: A051396 := proc(n) option remember; if n <= 1 then n else (2*n-2)*(2*n-3)*A051396(n-1)+1; fi; end;
author: Aleksandar Petojevic.
